alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 30 at 11:50PM CDT until July 31 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BENTON...NORTHERN MADISON...CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 1150 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Omaha to 4 miles northwest of Rule to 4 miles east of Lowell, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Rogers... Berryville... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Pea Ridge... Green Forest... Gateway... Beaver... Hindsville... Wesley... Carrollton... Rudd... Kingston... Forum... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Withrow Springs State Park... War Eagle... Marble... Osage... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
